ValidationRule.description: Session Duration is required for Coaching Request to move the status from define to design.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( RecordType.DeveloperName ='Individual_Coaching', RecordType.DeveloperName ='Group_Coaching' ), ISCHANGED(Product_Request_Status__c), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Product_Request_Status__c),'Define'), ISPICKVAL(Product_Request_Status__c, 'Design'), ISBLANK(Session_Duration_Mins__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: “Session Duration (Mins)” is required to update the Product Request Status.
